faqs.question: Who can Join the Club? Is there any eligibility criteria, or any membership fee?
faqs.answer: Anyone studying in Birendra Multiple Campus can join the club. We welcome students from all backgrounds and levels of experience. There is no membership fee to join the club.

faqs.question: Is BOSC affiliated with any other organizations?
faqs.answer: No, but we must work under the Rules and Regulations established by Birendra Multiple Campus, since we are a student club registered under the college.

faqs.question: Will BOSC Collaborate with other clubs?
faqs.answer: Yes, we are open to collaborating with other clubs and organizations. We believe that working together will help us achieve our goals more effectively.

faqs.question: How can I contribute to BOSC?
faqs.answer: You can contribute to BOSC by participating in our events, workshops, and training sessions. You can also volunteer to help us organize events, or share your knowledge and expertise with other members.

faqs.question: What is Open Source?
faqs.answer: Open Source refers to software that is freely available to use, modify, and distribute. Open Source software is developed by a community of developers who collaborate to improve the software and make it available to everyone.
